item.description:
OK several people wanted a hike close to Boston so here it is.....

Meet at Davis Sq T stop at 10am OR at 11:00 AM at the Wachusett Mountain State Reservation Visitor Center. We will have about a 5 to 6 mile total hike to the top (over 2000 foot summit) and loop back to the cars. This will be a great way to get in shape for the ski/board season. This will be the day after our first annual pub crawl so I promise a moderate pace to accommodate those that choose to do both. No cost, nothing included.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at Davis Sq at 10am or Wachusett at 11am
item.name: Wachusett Mountain Hike
